name: League Run
description: ARE YOU READY TO BE A FOOTBALL LEGEND? If your answer is yes, then LEAGUE RUN is exactly what you're looking for! Run this league to become a legendary football player, shoot with all you got!
developers: SEKGAMES Oyun Yazilim Teknoloji ve Pazarlama Anonim Sirketi
